page.title: 06PAYING US A VISIT
page.content: {VISITORS}to our area could see 1.The 1745 Battle of Prestonpans Memorial Stone (A198) 2.Seton Palace and Seton Collegiate Church (A198) and learn of the Setons, granted land in East Lothian by King David 1 in 1124 and dispossessed in 1715 for being followers of the Stuarts. 3.St.Germains and see the ruins of a hospital and chapel thought to be named after a 'Mestre de la maison de St. Germe' mentioned in the Ragman's Roll. 4.Chalmer's Memorial Church, Port Seton, attending to the very unusual inside decorations on walls, church furniture and roof beams. For{RECREATION}the area has golf, swimming, tennis, bowling, putting, beaches for sailing or canoeing.
